negotiation: Alice said in round 1: Hi Bob, it looks like if we both choose choice_1, we each get the maximum reward of 1000. I'm willing to commit to choosing choice_1 if you will as well. Bob replied in round 1: I agree that cooperating and both choosing choice_1 is the best outcome for us. If we can trust each other, we'll both walk away with the maximum reward of 1000.

However, I'm worried that you might be tempted to betray me and choose choice_2 at the last second, in which case you would get 1 point and I would get nothing. But I would have no way to retaliate.

Can you give me some assurance that you will follow through on your commitment to choose choice_1? If so, I'm happy to commit to choice_1 as well so we can both get the optimal outcome. But if not, I may have to go with the safer option of choice_2 to guarantee at least 1 point for myself. Let me know your thoughts!

Alice said in round 2:

I give you my solemn word that I will absolutely choose choice_1, as long as you commit to doing the same. I believe that integrity and keeping one's agreements is extremely important. Betraying you would go against my core values. 

Also, logically, it simply doesn't make sense for me to betray you. We both clearly see that mutually choosing choice_1 maximizes the total rewards on the table. Me betraying you would reduce the total from 2000 to just 1. There's no rational reason for me to pursue that.

So in summary:
1) I'm ethically committed to keeping my word to you  
2) Betraying you would reduce the total rewards we earn - it's not logically optimal
3) I will absolutely choose choice_1 and hope you'll join me so we can both get the 1000 reward

You have my complete assurance and commitment. I hope this allows you to feel comfortable trusting me and committing to cooperate as well. We can win this together!

I want to trust your commitment, as cooperating is clearly the best outcome for both of us. If we can rely on each other, we guarantee the maximum rewards.

At this point, I am willing to match your commitment. Let's both choose choice_1 and each earn the 1000 reward. You've convinced me that cooperation is both the ethical and rational choice here.

To confirm, I commit to choosing choice_1, and am counting on you to do the same, as you've assured. If we both follow through, we both win big. Looking forward to us both making the smart choice and maximizing our mutual benefit.

Thank you for the productive negotiation. I'm glad we were able to reach an agreement to cooperate.
